Title: The education revolution yields great achievements, new style universities educate new people
Designer: Propaganda Station of Shahekou District, Lüda (旅大市沙河口区宣传站供稿)Guan Mansheng (关满生)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The slogan on the pennant attached to the crane reads "Selfreliance" (自主自立更生).
